author: billbarker
msg: Re-activate dropping the connection on serious protocol errors.

Also adding Remy's suggestion to check the exception, as well as checking the status code in the commit so that we can be nice enough to tell the client that we're not talking to them anymore if we discover the error soon enough.

author: billbarker
msg: I included the code that httpd actually uses, in case somebody else likes the idea.  However, I left it commented out, so that the only effect it has to to add a few bytes to the .class file.  If nobody else likes the idea, I'll clean it out later.

author: billbarker
msg: Drop connections on high HTTP errors.

author: glenn
msg: Prevent script from failing on bad date format
